TopicTitle: Is there a thread for requesting assistance with craft designs?

Articles.Content: I took a look at the spacecraft exchange however it didn't really look like the right sort of place to ask for assistance with a design. Is there anywhere particular that I'd get the best results asking for help making my first walk-in rover?

If you want help with a specific craft, then I think it is best to go to the help section. If you want more general craft designs I would say general discussion (Though spacecraft section might apply as well)

Ok cool. Well I'm gonna leave my issue in here and see how it goes for now so not to spam the forums. Basically I'm using completely stock parts and despite having already designed the most awkward part which is the walk-in interior which also holds a crew module, I can't seem to find a part that will allow the 2x2 and 1x1 structural panels to meet up nicely in size. I've been using the small girder-like cubes and the not-rockomax cube thingy to match up sizes relatively easily for the 1x1's but getting them to meet up in a reasonable manner with the 2x2's has caused me no end of trouble. Also the part count is becoming incredibly problematic already so if there is any part I could be using to optimize the craft better and make things fit better would be really handy
